page.title: 07COMMUNICATIONS,EPPERSTONE
page.content: { Buses}come through the village on 2 different routes on Monday to Saturday The Trent Bus Company operates between Nottingham and Southwell and back 6 times a day while Barton buses come to the village from Nottingham 8 times. However almost all households own at least one car. { Mail}is delivered in the village twice a day and collected from the post box,opposite the shop,twice on weekdays and once on Saturday.There is a public{telephone}box in the village, but most houses have private lines. Five{local publications}are delivered Half the households take the {Nottingham Evening Post}and some the weekly{Newark Advertiser}.Free,monthly are{The Dover Beck}covering events in the parish{The Bramley}_news from around Southwell and{See}_Church news from the Southwell Diocese.
